name: compile-speak
description: Compiles sentences of the form 'Name says Message' into Haxe classes with a speak() method that prints the Message.

arguments.name: dsl
arguments.description: The DSL input in the format 'Name says Message'

notes: The generated Haxe class will implement the Speaker interface
The class will have a default constructor and a speak() method
The speak() method will print the message using trace()
